events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it didn’t fit as expected.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer’s message regarding the jacket purchase.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refunds for further assistance.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is new, never worn, and still has all original tags attached.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate how smoothly this refund process is going.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with your case.
Since there have been no further concerns reported, your refund case has now been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
